sentences.en: Any comparison that is not strictly factual runs the risk of being interpreted as subjective.
sentences.cn: 任何不完全切合实际的比较都有可能被当作主观臆断。

sentences.en: Both involved rather typical factual situations.
sentences.cn: 两个问题都牵涉到相当典型的实际情况.

sentences.en: Factual and forensic evidence makes a suicide verdict the most compelling answer to the mystery of his death.
sentences.cn: 事实证据和法庭证据使得自杀成为解开他死因之谜的最令人信服的答案。

sentences.en: I just try to be factual, Goldman.
sentences.cn: 我只不过是力求真实, 哥尔德曼.

sentences.en: Instead, it referred to the prior cases as involving " essentially ad hoc, factual inquiries ".
sentences.cn: 法院只是把先前的案例作为包含 “ 特别性质的事实调查 ”.

sentences.en: Some judges have felt uncomfortable about attempting to assess an agency's technical judgment on factual issues.
sentences.cn: 有些法官对于评价机构的事实性问题的技术性判断感到很不自在.

sentences.en: The editorial contained several factual errors.
sentences.cn: 社论里有几处事实性错误。

sentences.en: This advertising is informative and factual.
sentences.cn: 这种广告具有提供情况和符合实际的特点.

sentences.en: This is a factual account of the war.
sentences.cn: 这是一篇有关这场战争的真实报道.

sentences.en: Thought arising from factual experience may be a bridle or a spur.
sentences.cn: 由实际经验而产生的想法,可能是一种约束,也可能是一种刺激.

sentences.en: Thus, agencies may face intensive judicial scrutiny of their factual determinations.
sentences.cn: 这样, 机构就会面临对他们的事实性裁决做详尽的司法检查.

sentences.en: Try to keep your account of events as factual as possible.
sentences.cn: 你要尽量如实地说明情况。

sentences.en: We must go beyond the mere analysis of factual causes and effects.
sentences.cn: 我们不能只限于分析事实上的原因及结果.

sentences.en: With respect to factual issues, the standard of review depends on the type of proceeding.
sentences.cn: 至于那些事实性问题, 复审的准则取决于程序的类型.

sentences.en: You'd better give us as much factual evidence as possible.
sentences.cn: 你最好向我们尽可能多地提供事实证据.

trans.tran_en: based on facts or relating to facts
